update pos_order
OPTIMISTIC = #{optimistic,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_TYPE = #{posType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REWARD_AMOUNT_TOTAL = #{rewardAmountTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
REWARD_AMOUNT = #{rewardAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

SALES_BILL_NO = #{salesBillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from pos_order where 1=1
and USER_NO = #{posOrderQueryBean.userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and STATUS <> 'DELETE' order by CREATE_TIME desc
